decision_conditions:
<p>All new external facing and roofing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including type, size, colour, bond, pointing, coursing, jointing, profile and texture.</p><p>

REASON: To protect the design character and appearance of the existing building and other buildings in the streetscene</p>
description: Erection of a single storey ground floor rear and side return extension and replacement of the existing single glazed timber sash windows to the front and rear of the property with double glazed timber sash windows
